languages.text: С годами ворчливый Главный кормчий Равор осквернел нравом. Неся непрекращающуюся вахту на капитанском мостике, он растерзывал всякого члена экипажа, недостаточно прилежно исполнявшего обязанности, и, удерживая штурвал множеством рук, уныло вещал мрачные предсказания, наполнявшие отчаянием сердца.

As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.
languages.original_text: С годами ворчливый Главный кормчий Равор осквернел нравом. Неся непрекращающуюся вахту на капитанском мостике, он растерзывал всякого члена экипажа, недостаточно прилежно исполнявшего обязанности, и, удерживая штурвал множеством рук, уныло вещал мрачные предсказания, наполнявшие отчаянием сердца.

traits.locale_text: As the years passed, grumpy Master Helmsman Ravor's temper became even more unbearable. Keeping his never-ending shift on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew, who was not diligent enough in fulfilling their duties. Holding the steering wheel with many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

As the years passed, grumpy Master Helmsman Ravor's temper became even more unbearable. Keeping his never-ending shift on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew, who was not diligent enough in fulfilling their duties. Holding the steering wheel with many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew who he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the steering apparatus with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew who he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the steering apparatus with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

languages.text: 随着时间的流逝，舵手长雷沃的坏脾气变得越来越让人难以忍受。他在舰桥上无休止地进行着监视，折磨一切他认为不够勤奋的船员。他用许多只手紧握着舵盘，在悲哀与绝望之中说出了无数可怕的预言。
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: 随着时间的流逝，舵手长雷沃的坏脾气变得越来越让人难以忍受。他在舰桥上无休止地进行着监视，折磨一切他认为不够勤奋的船员。他用许多只手紧握着舵盘，在悲哀与绝望之中说出了无数可怕的预言。

languages.text: Im Lauf der Jahre wurde das übellaunige Naturell von Hauptsteuermann Ravor noch unerträglicher. Er setzt seine unendliche Wache auf der Brücke fort und peinigte jedes Mitglied der Crew, das in seinen Augen nicht pflichtbewusst und dienstbeflissen genug war. Während er mit seinen vielen Händen das Ruder hielt, verkündete er düstere Prophezeiungen und säte Verzweiflung in den Herzen der Crew.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: Im Lauf der Jahre wurde das übellaunige Naturell von Hauptsteuermann Ravor noch unerträglicher. Er setzt seine unendliche Wache auf der Brücke fort und peinigte jedes Mitglied der Crew, das in seinen Augen nicht pflichtbewusst und dienstbeflissen genug war. Während er mit seinen vielen Händen den Steuerapparat hielt, verkündete er düstere Prophezeiungen und säte Verzweiflung in den Herzen der Crew.

languages.text: Au fil des ans, le mauvais caractère du maître timonier Ravor se fit de plus en plus insupportable. Toujours aux aguets sur la passerelle et sans jamais lâcher la barre de ses nombreuses mains, il tourmentait les membres d'équipage qu'il jugeait insuffisamment diligents dans l'accomplissement de leurs tâches et faisait de sinistres prophéties qui instillaient le désespoir dans le cœur de chacun.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: Au fil des ans, le mauvais caractère du maître timonier Ravor se fit de plus en plus insupportable. Toujours aux aguets sur la passerelle et sans jamais lâcher les commandes de ses nombreuses mains, il tourmentait les membres d'équipage qu'il jugeait insuffisamment diligents dans l'accomplissement de leurs tâches et faisait de sinistres prophéties qui instillaient le désespoir dans le cœur de chacun.

languages.text: Con el paso de los años, la mala disposición del maestro timonel se volvió aún más insufrible. Sin abandonar nunca su vigilancia del puente, atormentaba a todo miembro de la tripulación que no consideraba lo bastante diligente en el cumplimiento de sus deberes. Con sus múltiples manos sobre el timón, anunciaba profecías siniestras que llenaban de desesperación a cuantos las oían.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: Con el paso de los años, la mala disposición del maestro timonel se volvió aún más insufrible. Sin abandonar nunca su vigilancia del puente, atormentaba a todo miembro de la tripulación que no consideraba lo bastante diligente en el cumplimiento de sus deberes. Con sus múltiples manos sobre el timón, anunciaba profecías siniestras que llenaban de desesperación a cuantos las oían.

languages.text: 年を経るうちに、マスター・ヘルムスマンであるラヴォアの癇癪は一層耐えがたいものになった。艦橋からついぞ絶えることのない監視を行いながら、しかるべく職務に励んでいないと思われる乗員がいれば、誰であれ苦しめた。無数の手で舵を握りながら、悲痛におぞましい予言を宣告しては、乗員たちの心を絶望で満たしていった。
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: 年を経るうちに、マスター・ヘルムスマンであるラヴォアの癇癪は一層耐えがたいものになった。艦橋からついぞ絶えることのない監視を行いながら、しかるべく職務に励んでいないと思われる乗員がいれば、誰であれ苦しめた。無数の手で操舵具を握りながら、悲痛におぞましい予言を宣告しては、乗員たちの心を絶望で満たしていった。

languages.text: Yıllar geçtikçe Başserdümen Ravor'un hırçınlığı daha da katlanılamaz bir hâl aldı. Köprüdeki o sonu asla gelmeyen mesaisine devam ederken, vazifelerini yerine getirmek konusunda yeterince özenli olmadığını düşündüğü bütün tayfalara eziyet etti. Çok sayıdaki eliyle dümeni tutarken, kederli kehânetler dile getirdi, çevresindekilerin kalbini umutsuzlukla doldurdu.
languages.original_text: As the years passed, Master Helmsman Ravor's ill temper became even more unbearable. Continuing his never-ending watch on the bridge, he tormented any member of the crew whom he deemed not sufficiently diligent in fulfilling their duties. Holding the helm with his many hands, he woefully pronounced grim prophecies, filling hearts with despair.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar geçtikçe Başserdümen Ravor'un hırçınlığı daha da katlanılamaz bir hâl aldı. Köprüdeki o sonu asla gelmeyen mesaisine devam ederken, vazifelerini yerine getirmek konusunda yeterince özenli olmadığını düşündüğü bütün tayfalara eziyet etti. Çok sayıdaki eliyle dümeni tutarken, kederli kehânetler dile getirdi, çevresindekilerin kalbini umutsuzlukla doldurdu.
